body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/28710).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/733](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/733) (Deniability - a tool to automatically improve coin ownership privacy by denavila)
* [#bitcoin-core/gui/37](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/37) (indicate explicit to the user that the wallet balances shown is watch only. by Saibato)
* [#29221](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29221) (Implement 64 bit arithmetic op codes in the Script interpreter by Christewart)
* [#29205](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29205) (build: always set `-g -O2` in `CORE_CXXFLAGS` by fanquake)
* [#29198](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29198) (OP_CHECKTEMPLATEVERIFY, OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK(VERIFY), OP_INTERNALKEY validation (LNHANCE) by reardencode)
* [#29191](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29191) (refactor(tidy): Use C++20 contains method by aureleoules)
* [#29179](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29179) (test: wallet rescan with reorged parent + IsFromMe child in mempool by glozow)
* [#29175](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29175) (rpc: validate fee estimation mode case insensitive by torkelrogstad)
* [#29156](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29156) (tests: add functional test for miniscript decaying multisig by mjdietzx)
* [#29136](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29136) (wallet: `addhdkey` RPC to add just keys to wallets via new `void(KEY)` descriptor by achow101)
* [#29133](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29133) (refactor: Allow std::span construction from CKey by maflcko)
* [#29130](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29130) (wallet: Add `createwalletdescriptor` and `gethdkeys` RPCs for adding new automatically generated descriptors by achow101)
* [#29129](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29129) (wallet, rpc: add BIP44 `account` in `createwallet` by brunoerg)
* [#29124](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29124) (wallet: Automatically repair corrupted metadata with doubled derivation path by achow101)
* [#29119](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29119) (refactor: Use std::span over Span by maflcko)
* [#29112](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29112) (sqlite: Disallow writing from multiple `SQLiteBatch`s by achow101)
* [#29071](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29071) (refactor: Remove Span operator==, Use std::ranges::equal by maflcko)
* [#29050](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29050) (Add OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY opcodes by stevenroose)
* [#29039](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29039) (versionbits refactoring by ajtowns)
* [#29034](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29034) (test: detect OS in functional tests consistently using `platform.system()` by theStack)
* [#29015](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29015) (kernel: Streamline util library by ryanofsky)
* [#28948](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28948) (v3 transaction policy for anti-pinning by glozow)
* [#28928](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28928) (test: add coverage for bech32m in `wallet_keypool_topup` by brunoerg)
* [#28868](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28868) (wallet: Fix migration of wallets with txs that have both spendable and watchonly outputs by achow101)
* [#28833](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28833) (wallet: refactor: remove unused `SignatureData` instances in spkm's `FillPSBT` methods by theStack)
* [#28802](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28802) (ArgsManager: support subcommand-specific options by ajtowns)
* [#28776](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28776) (Wallet: Functions to enable adding used balance to GUI overview page by BrandonOdiwuor)
* [#28774](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28774) (Avoid returning references to mutex guarded members by vasild)
* [#28724](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28724) (wallet: Cleanup accidental encryption keys in watchonly wallets by achow101)
* [#28560](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28560) (wallet, rpc: `FundTransaction` refactor by josibake)
* [#28550](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28550) (Covenant tools softfork by jamesob)
* [#28336](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28336) (rpc: parse legacy pubkeys consistently with specific error messages by theStack)
* [#28333](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28333) (wallet: Construct ScriptPubKeyMans with all data rather than loaded progressively by achow101)
* [#28312](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28312) (test: fix `keys_to_multisig_script` (P2MS) helper for n/k > 16 by theStack)
* [#28307](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28307) (rpc, wallet: fix incorrect segwit redeem script size limit by furszy)
* [#28241](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28241) (Silent payment index (for light wallets and consistency check) by Sjors)
* [#28236](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28236) (fuzz: wallet, add target for Spend by Ayush170-Future)
* [#28122](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28122) (Silent Payments: Implement BIP352 by josibake)
* [#27865](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27865) (wallet: Track no-longer-spendable TXOs separately by achow101)
* [#27788](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27788) (rpc: Be able to access RPC parameters by name by achow101)
* [#27495](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27495) (ci: Use DEBUG=1 in depends for MSAN jobs by fanquake)
* [#27351](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27351) (wallet: add `seeds` argument to `importdescriptors` by apoelstra)
* [#27286](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27286) (wallet: Keep track of the wallet's own transaction outputs in memory by achow101)
* [#27114](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27114) (p2p: Allow whitelisting outgoing connections by brunoerg)
* [#27052](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27052) (test: rpc: add last block announcement time to getpeerinfo result by LarryRuane)
* [#26840](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26840) (refactor: importpubkey, importprivkey, importaddress, importmulti, and importdescriptors rpc by KolbyML)
* [#26008](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26008) (wallet: cache IsMine scriptPubKeys to improve performance of descriptor wallets by achow101)
* [#22838](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22838) (descriptors: Be able to specify change and receiving in a single descriptor string by achow101)
* [#21283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21283) (Implement BIP 370 PSBTv2 by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
